file_content.text: You have a destiny to fulfill. The Force has shown me.
Welcome home. The Jedi owe you a debt of gratitude we can never repay.
If Jedi wore Republic medals, your robe would be covered in them.
I only wish Master Orgus could share in this victory.
I'll honor his legacy to the end of my days.
So do I. He was a great man.
We all will. He was a great teacher and a good friend.
You're looking well, Master Kiwiiks.
How are you?
Better with each passing day, thanks to you.
Darth Angral paid dearly for killing Master Orgus.
I avenged him.
Angral earned his fate. No one will mourn his passing.
We've lost one of our noblest Masters, but in his place stands a Jedi without equal.
And you, Padawan... I knew you'd remain true to us.
The Emperor himself couldn't turn her. I saw it myself.
She's free of Sith influence.
The Emperor? You didn't think to mention his involvement sooner?
It's a long story, but the upshot is I'm a Jedi... and I always will be.
You've earned our trust, Kira. You deserve recognition of that.
The Emperor took control of her on Angral's ship. I had to beat some sense into her.
I had to fight her.
The Emperor did what? How can you be so casual about that?
It, uh, sounds worse than it was. And it won't happen again.
The fact you're here reveals all I need to know.
You deserve our thanks as well, young Padawan. You faced great danger for us.
I see no reason why we shouldn't make Kira a full-fledged Jedi Knight.
Kira deserves a promotion.
I agree. My troubled former Padawan has matured into a fine Jedi.
The Emperor himself tried turning Kira against me. He failed.
She faced the Emperor's will.
The Emperor? But why would he target your Padawan?
Uh... good question. Why did he do that?
The Emperor knows I'm a threat. He struck at me through someone I trust.
He wanted to kill me.
And he didn't count on me being stubborn. Big mistake.
The Emperor's been silent for years. If he's now taking a direct hand, it changes everything.
Agreed--and we will need strong Jedi to resist him.
I'm sure the Emperor had his reasons, but they're irrelevant.
It doesn't matter.
I disagree. I have many questions about this.
The point is that Kira was not swayed by the Emperor's influence. That bears special recognition.
Sith prey on the powerless. The Emperor saw an opportunity in you.
[Lie] Because you're weak.
By resisting him, Kira has shown she's anything but weak.
It's a miracle I survived having her on my team.
I did all the work.
Show your Padawan--and yourself--some generosity. Kira's come a long way under your strong guidance.
I agree. It's time we recognized that officially.
As leader of this Council, it's my pleasure to promote Kira Carsen to the rank of Jedi Knight.
You mean it?
It seems only fair--you did help save the galaxy.
You earned this, Kira.
So this is what it feels like, being respectable.
Just smile and say thank you.
Don't question a promotion.
Thank you. This is more than I ever hoped for.
I guess Master Satele thinks you're ready.
Apparently so.
Don't sound so supportive. The Council might think you're soft.
Master Satele's pulling your leg. We're reassigning you to sweep the temple floors.
You think it's a joke?
That might almost be a relief, after today.
Master Satele, you can't be serious.
This is all wrong.
Kira deserves this promotion. I suggest you accept what you cannot change.
The danger to Tython is over, but we're getting fresh reports of hostilities all over the galaxy. Another war with the Empire seems inevitable.
Darth Angral was the spark that lit the flame. Even in failure, he inspired the Sith to violence.
But he also forged our greatest weapon against the darkness.
The Force has shown me what lies ahead. The futures of many rest on your actions.
You will decide the fate of the Jedi... the Republic... the galaxy.
I'll defend the Republic to my dying breath.
Victory will be ours.
Master, that's quite a burden. I'm only one Jedi.
It's all resting on me?
The will of the Force can't be denied--but I'll stand by you through everything we must face.
I have also seen my future... and my victories are only beginning.
Yes, I will.
I get promoted, and you get the fate of the galaxy. Quite a day.
May the Force be with you--with all of us.
Thank the Force you're alive. When I saw Angral's battle cruiser explode, I feared the worst.
We had some close calls, but Angral and his weapon are finished.
The Force was with us.
Saving Tython is becoming a habit of yours.
Good to see you, Master Satele. Everyone safe down there?
Glad you're alright, too.
We are now, thanks to you.
Haven't you learned? I'm more powerful than anything the Sith can throw at me.
You should never doubt me.
Please come to the surface. Bring your Padawan to the Council chambers. We all have much to discuss.
